thread.title: Soros foundation says it might quit Hungary

title: Soros foundation says it might quit Hungary
text:
Soros foundation says it might quit Hungary 5:48pm BST - 01:31 
The foundation of financier George Soros says it's considering leaving Hungary, as right-wing Prime Minister Victor Orban vows to step up his fight against migrants and the NGOs that support them. Reuters' Marton Dunai reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The foundation of financier George Soros says it's considering leaving Hungary, as right-wing Prime Minister Victor Orban vows to step up his fight against migrants and the NGOs that support them. Reuters' Marton Dunai reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2qMtNQ0
